info.name: [SH17A] Un stretch the nyans
info.description: Can you fix the nyan kitties with your mouse? iChannelResolution is too many characters so you'll have to help them out!

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage( u, i ) vec2 r = iResolution.xy; vec4 m = texture(iChannel0, i-i), l=iMouse;u = i.x+i.y==1.?l:iFrame<3?(i/r).xyxy:texture(iChannel0, (i-(m.w*l.w<0.?i-i:9./(length(l.xy-i)+19.)*(l-m).xy))/r)

/*
#define mainImage( u, i )
    vec2 r = iResolution.xy;
    vec4 m = texture(iChannel0, i-i),
         l = iMouse;
         u = i.x+i.y==1.?                           // is this bottom left corner?
             l:                                     // if so store the mouse
             iFrame<3?                              // is this the time to initialize?
                 (i/r).xyxy:                        // start off with [0-1], no smudging
                 texture(iChannel0,                 // otherwise sample the previous image
                     (i-(m.w*l.w<0.?                // is mouse down this frame and last frame?
                         i-i:                       // mouse isnt held, dont change the location to sample
                         9./length(l.xy-i)*(l-m).xy // otherwise change the sample by a distance based on  
                     ))                             // inverse of the distance to the mouse, in the direction
                 /r)                                // that the mouse is moving
*/
renderpass.name: Buf A
